title: Iskender Kebab
ingredients: ['4 pitta breads', '1 tablespoon olive oil', '4 chicken breast fillets, roughly diced', '2 medium onions, chopped', '1 clove garlic, minced', '1/2 (600g) jar passata', 'ground cumin to taste', 'salt and freshly ground black pepper to taste', '125g (4 oz) butter, melted', '1 (200g) tub Greek yoghurt', 'good handful chopped fresh parsley']
